title: Drop in the Ocean? Spring Statement Special
itunes:title: Drop in the Ocean? Spring Statement Special
description:
Did the U.K. Chancellor do enough to help Britons meet the growing cost of living challenge? Rishi Sunak has defended his measures against criticism that he's leaving Britain's poorest behind. In this special episode, Bloomberg's Lizzy Burden unpicks the Spring Statement with Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker. Plus, Ben Zaranko from the Institute for Fiscal Studies, Suren Thiru from the British Chambers of Commerce, and Ethan Ilzetzki from the Centre for Economic Policy Research.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
